name: Punk.Over
description:
This game was created using Construct 2 Engine in 48h for the Construct Game Jam (2020).

The objetive of the game is to survive until the end of all three levels. You can clear all the levels in your own playstyle: Hiding from the enemys or just running and shooting.

Some sounds and musics don't belong to me, they were taked from freesound.org.
All the backgrounds were also changed from the original version. (Credits to the creators: Waneella and u/sequence_string)
